page.title: 07EVENTS IN POYNTIGTON
page.content: {Festivals:}Church Festivals of Easter, Harvest and Christmas are highlighted by the flower arrangers and admired by all.In Poyntington a popular Wine and Cheese party is held in December at the Manor House followed by an Auction Sale of Christmas fare to support the Church.{Fund_raising:}The Manor offers hospitality to aid Blackmore Vale Hunt; a Summer Supper aids Dr Banardo's Homes;Poyntington holds "a Village Day" in place of a Church Fete/Village Hall Fund_raiser with a similar event in Corton Denham _ Churches and Halls share the proceeds. Corton Denham residents also support their own{village events:}Produce and Flowers Shows,Harvest Suppers with local cheddar cheese and cider,and a Children's Christmas Party.Hunter trials occur in September in Poyntington.
